name: Adam's decision
description:
Defend your heart for being stolen from de gals and welcome the guys. Adam has made a decision, and the ladies are not welcomed.

Many thanks to Freesound.org,  @OzzedNet at twitter for the background music, open game art and 'NicoleMarieProductions' on OpenGameArt for the heart and my lover @FrynosHue for the sprites.

This is my firts jam and firts game made with the Love Framework. I hope you'll enjoy.

Albert Valo @thecuackdev
